Categorize this IT Ticket:

test strategy device list hello have asked source below items for testing for was referred order aid process please let know what information you need proceed thanks manager coordinator date friday re test strategy device list hi guys come think about se better option than have same resolution scale but se better processor more probably be around for little bit longer se or or whatever call when comes out or have different screen shape seen beta well android pixel device get android release galaxy with android or usually customize problems occur due best regards lead twitter en date friday re test strategy device list we might want galaxy date friday test strategy device list hello here device list strategy test strategy compatibility compatibility requirements open supported for mobile list devices for android android galaxy android os galaxy with latest release android os galaxy with latest release android os nexus with latest release android se with latest release plus with latest release with latest release for responsive web desktop browser list includes latest available minor version ie ie safari latest available versions edge chrome these browsers update mobile browser list includes browser version running following devices android galaxy tab with latest release android os galaxy with latest release android os galaxy with latest release android os with latest release plus with latest release with latest release digital solution architect
